title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5320.5 - Progressive component requirements; hardware and player safety
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5320.5 - Progressive component requirements; hardware and player safety

State Regulations

Electrical and mechanical parts and design principals of
the electronic associated progressive hardware shall not subject a player to
any physical hazards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5320.5

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
